summary: 2005 CHEVROLET COBALT. CONSUMER STATES POWER STEERING MALFUNCTION *TGW  THE CONSUMERS WIFE WAS DRIVING, WHEN ALL OF A SUDDEN THE STEERING BECAME DIFFICULT TO STEER. AFTER SHE PULLED OFF THE ROAD AND RE-STARTED THE VEHICLE, THE ISSUE WAS RESOLVED TEMPORARILY.  THE VEHICLE WAS TAKEN TO THE DEALER AND THE CONSUMER WAS INFORMED THE POWER STEERING ASSIST MOTOR NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE DEALER ALSO STATED THE VEHICLE WAS NOT A PART OF THE RECALL. *JB
